TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OnChangedCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OnChangedCallback(state As Object)
type OnChangedCallback = delegate of obj -> unit

param.name: state
param.span: 已更改的依赖对象的状态。

span.span: The state of the dependent object that was changed.

summary.span: 定义对某个方法的引用，该方法用于处理对被监视项的更改。

span.span: Defines a reference to a method that handles changes to monitored items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的更改监视器使用委托将信号发送到缓存实现，其内容缓存的对象中发生了更改。The delegate is used by a change monitor to signal to a cache implementation that a change has occurred in an object whose contents are cached. 任何实现的任务类型是监视缓存的对象中的更改。The task of any implementation of the type is to monitor for changes in objects that are cached. 例如，如果文件的内容包含在某个缓存项，并更新文件，其相关的缓存项必须也更改。For example, if the contents of a file are contained in a cache entry, and if the file is updated, its related cache entry must be changed also. 在典型的缓存实现中，派生实例使用以通知有关更改缓存的委托。In a typical cache implementation, a derived instance uses a delegate to notify the cache about a change.
